    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030915</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Respiración en humanos</string>
            <string language="en">Respiration in humans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmung in den Menschen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Respiration chez l'homme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Respiração nos seres humanos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Respirazione in esseri umani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπνοή στους ανθρώπους</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el recorrido del aire a través del tracto respiratorio humano. Trata también cómo se produce la respiración, diferencia entre respiración relajada y forzada y explica el mecanismo de control de la respiración.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the route the air takes through the human respiratory tract. It also deals with how respiration occurs, the difference between relaxed and forced respiration and explains the breathing control mechanism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Respiración</string>
            <string language="en">Respiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das den Weg erklärt, den die Luft durch 
die menschliche Atmungsfläche nimmt. Sie auch beschäftigt, wie
Atmung auftritt, der Unterschied zwischen entspannter und erzwungener 
Atmung und erklärt die atmensteuereinheit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant l'itinéraire que l'air prend par
la région respiratoire humaine. Il également traite la façon 
dont la respiration se produit, la différence entre la respiration 
détendue et forcée et explique le mécanisme de respiration de 
commande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica a rota que o ar faz exame 
através do intervalo respiratory humano. Também trata do como 
a respiração ocorre, a diferença entre a respiração relaxada e 
forçada e explica o mecanismo respirando do controle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega l'itinerario che l'aria prende
attraverso le vie respiratorie umane. Egualmente si occupa di 
come la respirazione accade, la differenza fra respirazione distesa e 
forzata e spiega il meccanismo di respirazione di controllo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θέμα που εξηγεί τη διαδρομή ο αέρας παίρνει μέσω 
της ανθρώπινης αναπνευστικής οδού. Εξετάζει επίσης πώς η 
αναπνοή εμφανίζεται, η διαφορά μεταξύ της χαλαρωμένης και 
αναγκασμένης αναπνοής και εξηγεί το μηχανισμό ελέγχου αναπνοής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmung</string>
          </keyword>
